docker启动kibana:

docker run -it -d -p 5601:5601 --name kibana -e ELASTICSEARCH_URL=http://192.168.124.6:9200 kibana


kibana操作ElasticSearch命令：

# get all indices
GET /_cat/indices

# get all indices
GET _all

#
GET /test_index

# create user with id=1/update user where id=1
PUT /test_index/user/1
{
  "firstName": "yang",
  "lastName": "lin",
  "age": "26",
  "interests": ["Playing Basketball"]
}

# create user with id generated by ES
POST test_index/user
{
  "firstName": "sawako",
  "lastName": "kuronuma",
  "age": "16",
  "interests": ["Playing Basketball"]
}

# get user where id=1
GET test_index/user/1

# query age, interests value of user where id=1
GET test_index/user/1?_source=age,interests

# update all information of user where id=1
PUT /test_index/user/1
{
  "firstName": "yang",
  "lastName": "lin",
  "age": "27",
  "interests": ["Playing Basketball"]
}

# update some information of user where id=1
POST test_index/user/1/_update
{
  "doc": {
    "age": "18"
  }
}

# delete user where id=1
DELETE test_index/user/1

# delete index named test_index 
DELETE test_index
